name: The Feelings Wheel
description:
The Feelings Wheel was developed by Dr. Gloria Willcox in 1982 as a way to help us put words to emotions. My therapist gave it to me recently, and I loved it as a way to better understand, recognize, and communicate my feelings. I couldn't find a simple version online to print out and hang on my wall, so I redrew this version.

You can find the original published paper here:
https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1177/036215378201200411
